name: cnsnews
text: RT @BrentBozell: The first time I saw Charlie Daniels perform was circa 1981 backing up the Marshall Tucker Band. Charlie was phenomenal and played his fiddle behind his back. He was so good the crowd called for an encore after the main performance finished.
